reason: Duplicate answer with q_4_1093, q_4_1094, q_4_1095 within batch (identical body content covering 휴가실시 유의점 and 연가일수 from page 310). Also duplicate with q_4_1090/q_4_1091 in batch 0192.
Duplicate answer with q_4_1092, q_4_1094, q_4_1095 within batch (same page 310 content, only opening sentence differs).
Question fabricates '교육청에서 자주 질의하는 내용' angle which is not supported by source. Source only contains regulations, not FAQ data. Duplicate answer with q_4_1092, q_4_1093, q_4_1095.

Question fabricates '흔히 발생하는 문제점' (common problems) angle which the source does not discuss. Answer just restates regulations without addressing problems. Duplicate answer with q_4_1092, q_4_1093, q_4_1094.

Good practical question about 수업일 중 연가. Answer accurately lists the 9 permitted reasons from 교원휴가에 관한 예규 제5조제1항 as found on page 311. Source text verified against 311쪽.md. No duplicate (first occurrence of this topic in batch).
Good practical question about 반일연가. Answer accurately states 반일단위 승인 가능, 2회=1일, 근무상황부 기재 방법 matching page 311 line 25-26. Source text verified. No duplicate.

Good question about 다음 재직기간 연가 미리사용. Answer accurately covers conditions, 재직기간별 최대 일수 table, 제외 대상, 절차 from pages 311-312. Source text verified against 311쪽.md. First occurrence of this topic in batch.
Duplicate question with q_4_1096: '수업일에 연가를 쓸 수 있나요?' is essentially identical to '수업일에도 연가를 쓸 수 있나요?' (only particle 도 difference). Answers cover same content from page 311.

Different question angle from q_4_1098 (need-based: '연가를 다 썼는데 더 필요하면'). Answer includes additional detail on 결근 처리 consequences and 사전 내부결재 requirements from page 312. Sources verified against 311쪽.md and 312쪽.md.
Duplicate question with q_4_1098: '연가를 미리 당겨 쓸 수 있나요?' is essentially the same as '다음 해 연가를 미리 당겨 쓸 수 있나요?'. Answers have near-identical structure and content.
